label: 町組
本: The Moneylenders of Late Medieval Kyoto . University of Hawai'i Press . 2001
説明文: From about the 1530s the machi [町] began to expand into a citywide network. Machi clusters, called machigumi and consisting of fourteen or fifteen neighborhoods each, coordinated self-defense and interneighborhood affairs (pp. 175-176).
